text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchtruckerey zu Bern und folgende Bücher in gar geringem Preis zu haben, als: 1. <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. H. Ringieri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>CX. Conciones de Cena Dominic.</TITLE> <VOLUME>3. Vol.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1680</YEAR>. das Exemplar in albo achthalben <PRIZE>bz.</PRIZE></BIBL> 2. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rissenii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Summa Theolog.</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1703</YEAR>. ¶ <PRIZE>10. Batzen,</PRIZE> und auff Schreib-papier <PRIZE>14. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 3. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rodolphi</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Compend. Theol. Christ</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern</PLACE><YEAR>1713</YEAR>. ¶ <PRIZE>8 Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 4. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Carechetischer Lehrer und Rauchwerck, d. i. Erklärung und Gebatt über den Heydelbergischen Catechismum,</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern,</PLACE> <YEAR>1711</YEAR>. mit dem Kupffer-Blatt haltet <PRIZE>15. und ein halben Bogen,</PRIZE> ¶ <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 5. <BIBL><TITLE>Biblia Piscatoris</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Rein,</PLACE> ¶ <PRIZE>15. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 6. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seelmatters</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Ewig- vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegrundete unüberwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinderen GOttes,</TITLE> gründlich vorgestellt über die Worte des 125. Pfalms <FORMAT>9. 1.</FORMAT> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1704</YEAR>. ¶ <PRIZE>5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":6,"explanation":"1. Fixed the spelling of 'Bücher' (books) and 'Preis' (price). 2. Corrected the encoding of special characters (¶, ü, ö, etc.). 3. Fixed the closing tag of <PRIZE> in the last <BIBL> entry. 4. Added missing spaces and punctuation for better readability. 5. Corrected the encoding of the paragraph symbol (¶). 6. Fixed the spelling of 'Lehrer' (teacher) in the fourth <BIBL> entry."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchtruckerey zu Bern und folgende Bücher in gar geringem Preis zu haben, als: 1. <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. H. Ringieri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>CX. parsed.explanation: 1. Fixed the spelling of 'Bücher' (books) and 'Preis' (price). 2. Corrected the encoding of special characters (¶, ü, ö, etc.). 3. Fixed the closing tag of <PRIZE> in the last <BIBL> entry. 4. Added missing spaces and punctuation for better readability. 5. Corrected the encoding of the paragraph symbol (¶). 6. Fixed the spelling of 'Lehrer' (teacher) in the fourth <BIBL> entry.
